name: Bombs
description: Will change the bomber's ability to put down bombs.

name: Fires
description: Will change the nature of the bomber's bomb explosion.

name: Bomb manipulation
description: Will allow the bomber to kick/throw bombs, etc.

name: Mushrooms
description: Will change the physicality of Mario.

name: Flowers
description: Will allow Mario to shoot magical projectiles.

name: Tools
description: Helps Mario to do various tasks in Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Vitamins
description: Increase a specific stat of a pokémon.

name: Electronics
description: Gives the trainer access to information and/or communication.

name: Poke balls
description: Allows the player to capture wild pokémon.
